author: ajsutton
content: I'd then propose epoch 112260 to activate Bellatrix.  That's 2022-08-04 12:24 pm UTC, 8:24am NY, 10:24pm Brisbane/Sydney (https://slots.symphonious.net and click "Upgrade Scheduler" if you want to play around with options).
